participant_1.background:
I have a family and a Porsche on my wish list, but I'm only 5'6".
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
my favorite band is the rolling stones.
My greatest challenge is to make sure that all of my students succeed.
my name is todd.

participant_2.background:
My ethnicity is not related to my job or my beliefs about the moon landing.
I have a student id and hate paying my bills.
I love to make sure my pets are happy and healthy.
I prefer to be comfortable and not draw much attention to myself.
my mom and dad are both red headed.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey there! I am doing well, thank you for asking! What about you?
I am doing well, too! Just got back from playing some guitar. I love playing music.
That's great! I love music too. I play the piano.
That's awesome! I have always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I know I should. I just haven't had the time to take lessons.
You could always teach yourself. There are a lot of great resources online.
That's true. I might have to look into that.
You should! It would be a great way to relax and relieve stress.
I know it would. I love playing guitar. It's so therapeutic.
I'm glad to hear that you enjoy playing music. It's a great way to express yourself.
I agree. It's a great way to let go of stress and just have fun.
I'm glad you think so. I hope you have a great day!
